ValidationRule.description: Before moving to Project Status "Funding Approved" the following mandatory fields must be filled: Name, Programme Location, Planned Implementation Start Date, Funding Organisation.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISBLANK(Name), ISBLANK(Programme_Location__c), ISBLANK(Planned_Implementation_Start_Date__c), ISBLANK(Funding_organisation__c) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Standard', OR( ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Funding Approved'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'In Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(ampi__Project_Status__c , 'Cancelled'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Implementation'), ISPICKVAL(Phase__c , 'Closure') ) )
